title: Great railway journeys. Series 4. Vol. 2
creator_credit: Brith Broadcasting Corporation, Mike Wadding and Nicola Bolton
brief_description: Part 1: Los Mochis to Veracruz . Chef Rick Stein takes a look at his points of interest on the train and along the track during the trip through the Sierra Madre Mountains in Mexico. Part 2: Singapore to Bangkok. Stephen Tompkinson’s (TV’s ‘Ballykissangel’) love for trains came from being born in an old English railway town. He takes a look at the Singapore mass transit system prior to his trip on the Eastern and Oriental Express. On the way he visits cities and looks at the local people and their cultures.
